Pre-Game Insights: The Kansas City Royals and the Houston Astros meet Friday in MLB action from Minute Maid Park.
Seth Lugo will start for the Royals on Friday. So far this year Lugo is 14-8 with a 3.19 ERA in 27 starts.
Framber Valdez will start for the Astros on Friday. So far this year Valdez is 13-6 with a 3.27 ERA in 23 starts.
